en-US: In the meantime, you can track the development of the desktop version by joining our community or checking out the roadmap. We're also looking for feedback and suggestions, so feel free to reach out to us or join our community.
zh-CN: 与此同时，您可以通过加入我们的社区或查看路线图来跟踪桌面版本的开发。我们也在寻找反馈和建议，所以请随时与我们联系或加入我们的社区。
